sentences.english: The scar on her hand, I ask Marla, how did she get it?
sentences.chinese: 她手上的吻痕，我問瑪拉，她怎麼弄的？

sentences.english: Her neck was covered with zits after her date with that Romeo.
sentences.chinese: 在跟那羅密歐約會後，她的脖子上滿布吻痕。

sentences.english: The girl blush when people stared at all the hickey on her neck.
sentences.chinese: 當別人盯著她脖子上的吻痕看時，她臉都泛紅了。

sentences.english: The girl blushed when people stared at all the hickeys on her neck.
sentences.chinese: 當別人盯着她脖子上的吻痕時，她臉都紅了。

sentences.english: Is that a hickey on your neck?
sentences.chinese: 你脖子上那個是吻痕嗎？

sentences.english: The kiss shines wet on the back of my white hand.
sentences.chinese: 在手背上的吻痕看起來很溼潤，閃着光。

sentences.english: The girl blushed when people stared at all the hickeys on her neck.
sentences.chinese: 當別人盯着她脖子上的吻痕看時，她臉都泛紅了。

sentences.english: On his hand was a scar from my kiss. From Tyler's kiss.
sentences.chinese: 在他手上有個我的吻痕，泰勒的吻痕。

sentences.english: On his hand was a scar from my kiss. From Tyler's kiss.
sentences.chinese: 在他手上有個我的吻痕，泰勒的吻痕。

sentences.english: Marla looks down at my hand and the scar from Tyler's kiss.
sentences.chinese: 馬拉低頭看見我手上泰勒留下的吻痕。

definition: trace/impression (e.g. footprint)/abbr. of 印子錢|印子钱[yin4 zi5 qian2], usury
